TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WritingProgressChangedEventHandler(object sender, WritingProgressChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WritingProgressChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents a method that will handle the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter.WritingProgressChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter> updates its progress during a writing operation.
